results.name: a(n) = n * 2^bigomega(n).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: Dirichlet g.f.: Product_{p prime} 1 / (1 - 2 * p^(1 - s)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Oct 29 2019
